name: Untitled Squirrel Game (turegrappa)
description:
Hello there this is my 6th ludum dare. This time I created a 3D Game about a squirrel that must HARVEST acorns for the winter. The game play is very easy: you have to harvest 10 acorns before time ends (120 seconds).

You can play with keyboard, using the arrow keys or WASD, or you can also use a Joypad (like X360 Controller).

Enjoy!

What will your score be? My best score is 10 acorns in 53 seconds.

Credits:
